channel.title: Onion Service Authorization
channel.description:
Hi,
i am having trouble setting up client authorization for my hidden service.
I created a hidden service with client authorization.
To set up my Whonix client machine, i followed the instructions from here: http://www.dds6qkxpwdeubwucdiaord2xgbbeyds25rbsgr73tbfpqpt4a6vjwsyd.onion/wiki/Onion_Services#Onion_Service_Authentication_Client_Setup
But when browsing the site, there is a small window asking for the key. When entering the key it says, that it is of the wrong format.
Any ideas?
thanks for your help!

item.title: Onion Service Authorization
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
I tried that before and failed to figure that out.

Read full topic

item.title: Onion Service Authorization

item.description:
Hi,

i am having trouble setting up client authorization for my hidden service.

To set up my Whonix client machine, i followed the instructions from here: http://www.dds6qkxpwdeubwucdiaord2xgbbeyds25rbsgr73tbfpqpt4a6vjwsyd.onion/wiki/Onion_Services#Onion_Service_Authentication_Client_Setup
